input.sentences: i was going to see some old buddies of mine .
when we got to the restraunt sam and mike where already there .
we hit it off well once again . i did not think we would not | but you never know .
we even ran into josh while we where out . he seemed rather surprised to see us as well .
in the end though i was sad to leave their company . my life however takes me far away from them .
